channel.title: Checking for multiple nonstacked items? And replacing all?
channel.description:
I'm doing fletching. What method checks for multiple items, that aren't stacked? playerHasItemAmount(int, int) is for stacked items. I'll look myself, but what method replaces every of one item with another item? And how can I make it so you get exp per item that was replaced?
Thanks.

item.title: Checking for multiple nonstacked items? And replacing all?
